name: AdiInviter Contacts Importer
short_description:
AdiInviter Pro allows your website visitors to import and invite their contacts to your website. AdiInviter Pro is the most complete and up to date contacts importer / tell-a-friend system in market. Import contacts from Facebook, Gmail, Yahoo, Outlook, AOL, GMX, Web.de, T-Online, iCloud, Twitter, Linkedin, MailChimp, Naver, Sohu, Daum, QQ, Xing, Mail.com,Freenet, Arcor, Libero, Virgilio, Excite.it, Email.it, Sapo, Fastmail, Terra, Bol.com.br, Qip.ru, Mail.ru, Rambler, Yandex, Pochta, Eventbrite, Zoho, Plaxo, iOL.pt, CitroMail.hu Wirtualna Polska, Onet, Data.bg, Laposte and lot more.

Live Demo : http://www.adiinviter.com
summary: Import Contacts From Facebook, Gmail, Yahoo, Outlook, AOL, GMX, Web.de
